name: Hide and Seek (Commodore Business Machines, Inc.)
overview: Hide and Seek is an educational package for children between the ages of four to ten years old. The package contains three games that tests and teaches the child to remember the positions of pictures of various items. The three games are: Find It: Six pictures are shown before being turned over and the computer asks where a certain picture is. The child has two guesses before the location is shown. Seek It: There are three levels of difficulty to choose from (Hard, Very Hard and Extra Hard) and the child has to place nine pictures in an order of their choosing. The pictures are turned over before the computer asks where a certain picture is. Once again the child has two guesses. What's Missing: The child can decide whether to read and select a picture or have to actually spell the word for the picture. Nine pictures are shown before the pictures are turned over. The pictures are shown again with one missing and the child has to guess which item.
